snippet: Robert Bates, a former volunteer sheriff’s deputy who says he confused his handgun and stun gun when he killed an unarmed man, will face a jury trial in February.
abstract: Judge James Caputo sets trial date for Robert Bates, former Tusla, Okla, reserve deputy who pleaded not guilty to second-degree manslaughter in shooting death of Eric Harris.
lead_paragraph: Robert Bates, a former volunteer sheriff’s deputy who says he confused his handgun and stun gun when he killed an unarmed man, will face a jury trial in February.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Trial Set for Ex-Deputy Who Says He Confused Gun With Taser
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Trial Set for Ex-Deputy Who Says He Confused Gun With Taser
